<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Little Love](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1483)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 94</row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This steel _+1 [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ is chipped and worn but no less deadly for its much-used appearance. When you critically succeed at an attack roll with _Little Love_, you can activate the dagger to spring away from your foes.

<document level="2" id="action-1120" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
